news_header: The IPO market showed significant improvement in 2024, with more IPOs and increased capital raised compared to previous years.
news_original_title: Increased Dealmaking Signals Continued IPO Market Recovery
news_text: In 2024, the IPO market rebounded with 221 new IPOs in the U.S., a notable increase from 151 in 2023. Factors contributing to this growth included falling inflation and interest rates, leading to improved investor sentiment. The total capital raised in IPOs was $10 billion more than in 2023, with 73% of new listings on Nasdaq. Notably, 14 IPOs had a day-one market cap over $5 billion. The median return for IPOs improved significantly compared to the previous two years, indicating a healthier market outlook as we move into 2025.
